Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2011 12:08PM hallam060306 wrote: Hello all-I'm new on here.  But, today my mom got a call saying they found a dense area and she has to go back on Friday for an ultrasound.  She's 48, and pre menopausal.  When my dad called me to tell me I got very worried and histerical.  I was very upset and then she told me she wasnt even scared and its nothing to worry about and do research on the internet, and here I am.  Any information that anyone has that maybe can help ease my mind, would be great.  Thanks!
Posts.Title: Just have a quick question Lynn97 Lynn97
